system_description: ContosoShop – React SPA front-end with REST API in Azure App Service + SQL back-end + Service Bus for transaction decoupling.
issue_summary: Checkout process fails with 500 error after submitting payment details.

conversation_history.message: Our customers can't complete purchases—after entering payment info, they're getting a generic error and can't proceed. This is impacting all users.
Thank you for reporting this. We're escalating this issue as a critical incident and will provide updates as soon as we have more information.
